data.text: @KPisarska @FarooqAhm @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk Is it not same country who refused to take a single Siryan refugees to entry the country when NATO bombarded the Sirya and Libya? How many Afgan reguees are in Poland? Why? Same colour breed? Hypocrisy!!!!

@rossimone77 @SKisContent @KPisarska @PrivacyMatters @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk Geographical distance & common cultural mores do make a difference, however. And if a billion Chinese ("anyone") ask for asylum in Poland, they "should be welcome"? B&W blanket assertions generally make people look foolish. This is not Utopia, Utopian wishes need not apply.

@rossimone77 @UnseenSpinster @KPisarska @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk @pritipatel If you are going to start playing the ethnicity card, this coversation is over. I can have a informed honest debate around the complexities of refugees vs criminal gangs smuggling economic migrants, but if you are going to be silly about it, I am not interested.

@rossimone77 @UnseenSpinster @KPisarska @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk @pritipatel No they are not. Do you even acknowledge that economic migrants who pay people smugglers money to get them into Europe, exist?

@PostFromProtest @UnseenSpinster @KPisarska @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk @pritipatel As to your statement that not all refugees are making honest claims, how do you recognise the honest one from the dishonest ones if not by letting them apply and check their documents? Or do you prefer the “skin tone” method? https://t.co/SYzAKA8cwW

@PostFromProtest @UnseenSpinster @KPisarska @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk @pritipatel It is exactly the same thing. Both are refugees. And they should be welcomed as international treaties state.

@rossimone77 @UnseenSpinster @KPisarska @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk @pritipatel Not the same thing though. Those people could have been trafficked economic migrants, which is why they often don't bring any documentation with them. This assumption that everyone is a refugee is dishonest. Yes some are, but many are not.

@KPisarska @michaldworczyk @MichalSzczerba @Dariusz_Jonski @MariaKatarzyna @Gasiuk_Pihowicz @olgatokariuk @HopkoHanna @dkaleniuk What nobody dared to do with them when Fall Weiss arrived.
 🤝>indiferrence
